Title: Enacts the "home repair act"
Summary: Enacts the "home repair act" establishing a home repair program and home repair fund to assist in home repairs by homeowners and landlords to improve home conditions.
LawCode: Add ยง14-a, Pub Hous L; add ยง99-ss, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law and the state finance law, in relation to enacting the "home repair act"
